definition: inaminate object made of clay, marble or other material; often of a person or thing
what you do to direct a vehicle
A domesticated carnivorous mammal (Canis familiaris) related to the foxes and wolves and raised in a wide variety of breeds.
A word or gesture of welcome or salutation.
Being positive or desirable in nature; not bad or poor:  a good experience; good news from the hospital.
